projects.title: Smoke alert bot
projects.description: AI powered smoke alert bot for forest fires monitoring
projects.html:
Telegram BOT development


I have been part of the development of an innovative project that aims to use AI and video cameras to monitor forests for the early detection of wildfires.

Tech stack

  • Python
  • Telegram.ext

By placing cameras strategically, the system records live videos and uses AI algorithms to analyze them in real time. This helps to quickly spot potential fires by identifying changes in temperature and the environment, and it sends immediate alerts to forest authorities for quick action.

The project is flexible and can be expanded, and ongoing improvements to the AI model make it more accurate.

This project highlights how technology can help protect the environment and prevent the damaging effects of forest fires on ecosystems and communities.

projects.title: KML Map Viewer
projects.description: User-friendly platform for exploring and understanding location data through interactive maps and KML file integration.
projects.html:
I developed a web-based application that leverages Google Maps to visualize and interact with extensive location data stored in KML files. This platform empowers users to explore geographical information with ease and clarity.

Tech stack

  • JavaScript
  • MySQL
  • Vue.js
  • Laravel
  • PHP

The application features a user-friendly interface that allows users to select specific affiliates. Upon selection, the map dynamically displays relevant location data derived from uploaded KML files. Administrators have the capability to upload and manage KML files for each affiliate, ensuring data accuracy and currency.

Users can interact with the map to view detailed information about objects within the affiliate's area. The layered KML file display enables users to toggle and visualize data from various sources, providing a comprehensive understanding of the spatial information. This project streamlines the process of accessing and interpreting complex location data, making it accessible to a broader audience.

The system is designed for scalability and maintainability, utilizing a robust tech stack to ensure performance and reliability. Future enhancements could include advanced filtering options and integration with additional data sources.
